General.Name: LMS Co. Ltd
General.Description: LMS Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies display and optical components and materials. It operates through Display Business and Optical Information Business divisions. The Display Business division offers hybrid light accumulation sheet products, LMS reflective polarizer sheets, lamination sheets, reverse prism sheets, LMS diffuser sheets, and LMS reflection sheets. The Optical Information Business division provides absorption IR cut-off filters for cameras. The company was formerly known as LGS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LMS Co., Ltd. in August 2008. LMS Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
